chart.description: Connection status as reported by kong.dao
chart.name: Database Reachable
chart.programText: A = data('gauge.kong.database.reachable', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong'), extrapolation='last_value').count(by=['host']).publish(label='A')

chart.description: Average latency for upstream responses compared with -24h average
chart.name: Upstream Latency
chart.programText:
J = data('counter.kong.upstream.latency', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('service_name', '*'), rollup='latest').sum(by=['service_name']).publish(label='J', enable=False)
K = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('service_name', '*'), rollup='latest').sum(by=['service_name']).publish(label='K', enable=False)
L = (J / K).publish(label='L')
O = (J).sum().publish(label='O', enable=False)
P = (K).sum().publish(label='P', enable=False)
Q = (O/P).timeshift('1d').publish(label='Q')

chart.description: Average request processing time compared with -24h
chart.name: Request Latency
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.kong.requests.latency', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong'), rollup='latest').sum(by=['host']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
D = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong'), rollup='latest').sum(by=['host']).publish(label='D', enable=False)
E = (A / D).publish(label='E')
I = (E).timeshift('1d').publish(label='I')

chart.description: Number of 4xx errors per interval by HTTP method
chart.name: 4xx Responses by HTTP Method
chart.programText: A = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('api_name', '*') and filter('status_code', '4*'), rollup='delta').sum(by=['http_method', 'status_code']).publish(label='A')

chart.description: Rate of total requests made to Kong
chart.name: Requests / Second
chart.programText: A = data('counter.kong.requests.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong')).sum().publish(label='A')

chart.description: Service/API-fielded request transfer rate compared with -24h
chart.name: Bytes In / Second
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.kong.requests.size', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong')).sum().publish(label='A')
B = (A).timeshift('1d').publish(label='B')

chart.description: Rate of responses from Kong
chart.name: Responses / Second
chart.programText: A = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong')).sum().publish(label='A')

chart.description: Average latency for upstream responses compared with -24h average
chart.name: Upstream Latency
chart.programText:
J = data('counter.kong.upstream.latency', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('route_id', '*'), rollup='latest').sum(by=['route_id']).publish(label='J', enable=False)
K = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('route_id', '*'), rollup='latest').sum(by=['route_id']).publish(label='K', enable=False)
L = (J / K).publish(label='L')
O = (J).sum().publish(label='O', enable=False)
P = (K).sum().publish(label='P', enable=False)
Q = (O/P).timeshift('1d').publish(label='Q')

chart.description: Average latency for responses from upstream groups compared with -24h
chart.name: Upstream Latency
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.kong.upstream.latency', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong'), rollup='latest').sum(by=['host']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
D = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong'), rollup='latest').sum(by=['host']).publish(label='D', enable=False)
E = (A / D).publish(label='E')
I = (E).timeshift('1d').publish(label='I')

L = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('service_name', '*')).sum(by=['service_name']).publish(label='L', enable=False)
O = (K/L).publish(label='O')
R = (K).sum().publish(label='R', enable=False)
S = (L).sum().publish(label='S', enable=False)
V = (R/S).timeshift('1d').publish(label='V')

chart.programText:

B = data('gauge.kong.connections.reading', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong'), rollup='sum').sum().publish(label='B')

chart.name: Request Size

K = data('counter.kong.requests.size', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('api_name', '*')).sum(by=['api_name']).publish(label='K', enable=False)
L = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('api_name', '*')).sum(by=['api_name']).publish(label='L', enable=False)
M = (K/L).publish(label='M')
P = (K).sum().publish(label='P', enable=False)
Q = (L).sum().publish(label='Q', enable=False)
R = (P/Q).timeshift('1d').publish(label='R')

chart.description: Number of 4xx errors per interval by HTTP method
chart.name: 4xx Responses by HTTP Method

chart.description: Average Kong-induced latency for requests compared with -24h average
chart.name: Kong Latency
chart.programText:
J = data('counter.kong.kong.latency', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('api_name', '*'), rollup='latest').sum(by=['api_name']).publish(label='J', enable=False)
K = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('api_name', '*'), rollup='latest').sum(by=['api_name']).publish(label='K', enable=False)
L = (J / K).publish(label='L')
O = (J).sum().publish(label='O', enable=False)
P = (K).sum().publish(label='P', enable=False)
Q = (O/P).timeshift('1d').publish(label='Q')

chart.description: 5 largest average Kong-induced latencies for requests by Service/API compared with -24h overall average
chart.name: Kong Latency
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.kong.kong.latency', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('service_name', '*'), rollup='latest').sum(by=['service_name']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
D = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('service_name', '*'), rollup='latest').sum(by=['service_name']).publish(label='D', enable=False)
E = (A / D).top(count=5).publish(label='E')
J = data('counter.kong.kong.latency', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('api_name', '*'), rollup='latest').sum(by=['api_name']).publish(label='J', enable=False)
K = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('api_name', '*'), rollup='latest').sum(by=['api_name']).publish(label='K', enable=False)
L = (J / K).top(count=5).publish(label='L')
M = (A).sum().publish(label='M', enable=False)
N = (D).sum().publish(label='N', enable=False)
O = (J).sum().publish(label='O', enable=False)
P = (K).sum().publish(label='P', enable=False)
Q = ((M+O) / (N+P)).timeshift('1d').publish(label='Q')

chart.description: Rate of responses by Service/API
chart.name: Responses / Second
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong')).sum(by=['service_name']).publish(label='A')
B = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong')).sum(by=['api_name']).publish(label='B')

chart.description: Within past hour
chart.name: Responses
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('route_id', '*'), rollup='sum').sum().publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('route_id', '*'), rollup='sum').timeshift('1h').sum().publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (A-B).above(0).publish(label='C')

chart.description: Average size of responses compared with -24h average
chart.name: Response Size
chart.programText:
K = data('counter.kong.responses.size', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('route_id', '*')).sum(by=['route_id']).publish(label='K', enable=False)
L = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('route_id', '*')).sum(by=['route_id']).publish(label='L', enable=False)
O = (K/L).publish(label='O')
R = (K).sum().publish(label='R', enable=False)
S = (L).sum().publish(label='S', enable=False)
V = (R/S).timeshift('1d').publish(label='V')

chart.description: Number of Route-fielded requests per interval by HTTP method
chart.name: Requests by HTTP Method
chart.programText: A = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('route_id', '*'), rollup='delta').sum(by=['http_method']).publish(label='A')

chart.description: 5 largest average latencies for responses from upstream groups by Service/API compared with -24h overall average
chart.name: Upstream Latency
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.kong.upstream.latency', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('service_name', '*'), rollup='latest').sum(by=['service_name']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
D = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('service_name', '*'), rollup='latest').sum(by=['service_name']).publish(label='D', enable=False)
E = (A / D).top(count=5).publish(label='E')
J = data('counter.kong.upstream.latency', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('api_name', '*'), rollup='latest').sum(by=['api_name']).publish(label='J', enable=False)
K = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('api_name', '*'), rollup='latest').sum(by=['api_name']).publish(label='K', enable=False)
L = (J / K).top(count=5).publish(label='L')
M = (A).sum().publish(label='M', enable=False)
N = (D).sum().publish(label='N', enable=False)
O = (J).sum().publish(label='O', enable=False)
P = (K).sum().publish(label='P', enable=False)
Q = ((M+O)/(N+P)).timeshift('1d').publish(label='Q')

chart.description: Average Kong-induced latency for requests compared with -24h average
chart.name: Kong Latency
chart.programText:
J = data('counter.kong.kong.latency', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('service_name', '*'), rollup='latest').sum(by=['service_name']).publish(label='J', enable=False)
K = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('service_name', '*'), rollup='latest').sum(by=['service_name']).publish(label='K', enable=False)
L = (J / K).publish(label='L')
O = (J).sum().publish(label='O', enable=False)
P = (K).sum().publish(label='P', enable=False)
Q = (O/P).timeshift('1d').publish(label='Q')

chart.name: Responses / Second
chart.programText:
B = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('service_name', '*')).sum(by=['service_name']).publish(label='B')
C = (B).sum().timeshift('1d').publish(label='C')

chart.description: Average size of Route-fielded client requests compared with -24h average
chart.name: Request Size
chart.programText:
K = data('counter.kong.requests.size', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('route_id', '*')).sum(by=['route_id']).publish(label='K', enable=False)
L = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('route_id', '*')).sum(by=['route_id']).publish(label='L', enable=False)
M = (K/L).publish(label='M')
P = (K).sum().publish(label='P', enable=False)
Q = (L).sum().publish(label='Q', enable=False)
R = (P/Q).timeshift('1d').publish(label='R')

chart.description: Rate of Route responses
chart.name: Responses / Second
chart.programText: A = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('route_id', '*')).sum().publish(label='A')

chart.description: Number of 4xx errors per interval by HTTP method
chart.name: 4xx Responses by HTTP Method
chart.programText: A = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('status_code', '4*') and filter('service_name', '*'), rollup='delta').sum(by=['http_method', 'status_code']).publish(label='A')

chart.description: Average size of response from Service/API compared with -24h
chart.name: Response Size
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.kong.responses.size', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong')).sum(by=['host']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
C = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong')).sum(by=['host']).publish(label='C', enable=False)
E = (A/C).publish(label='E')
J = (E).timeshift('1d').publish(label='J')

chart.description: Rate of API responses
chart.name: Responses / Second
chart.programText: A = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('api_name', '*')).sum().publish(label='A')

chart.description: Average size of Service-fielded client requests compared with -24h average
chart.name: Request Size
chart.programText:
K = data('counter.kong.requests.size', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('service_name', '*')).sum(by=['service_name']).publish(label='K', enable=False)
L = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('service_name', '*')).sum(by=['service_name']).publish(label='L', enable=False)
M = (K/L).publish(label='M')
P = (K).sum().publish(label='P', enable=False)
Q = (L).sum().publish(label='Q', enable=False)
R = (P/Q).timeshift('1d').publish(label='R')

chart.description: Average latency for upstream responses compared with -24h average
chart.name: Upstream Latency
chart.programText:
J = data('counter.kong.upstream.latency', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('api_name', '*'), rollup='latest').sum(by=['api_name']).publish(label='J', enable=False)
K = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('api_name', '*'), rollup='latest').sum(by=['api_name']).publish(label='K', enable=False)
L = (J / K).publish(label='L')
O = (J).sum().publish(label='O', enable=False)
P = (K).sum().publish(label='P', enable=False)
Q = (O/P).timeshift('1d').publish(label='Q')

chart.description: 5 largest average sizes of upstream-fielded client requests by Service/API compared with -24h overall average
chart.name: Request Size
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.kong.requests.size', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong')).sum(by=['service_name']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong')).sum(by=['service_name']).publish(label='B', enable=False)
E = (A/B).top(count=5).publish(label='E')
K = data('counter.kong.requests.size', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong')).sum(by=['api_name']).publish(label='K', enable=False)
L = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong')).sum(by=['api_name']).publish(label='L', enable=False)
M = (K/L).top(count=5).publish(label='M')
N = (A).sum().publish(label='N', enable=False)
O = (B).sum().publish(label='O', enable=False)
P = (K).sum().publish(label='P', enable=False)
Q = (L).sum().publish(label='Q', enable=False)
R = ((N+P)/(O+Q)).timeshift('1d').publish(label='R')

chart.description: Within past hour
chart.name: Responses
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('service_name', '*'), rollup='sum').sum().publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong') and filter('service_name', '*'), rollup='sum').timeshift('1h').sum().publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (A-B).above(0).publish(label='C')

chart.description: Rate of total requests made to Kong
chart.name: Requests / Second
chart.programText: A = data('counter.kong.requests.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong')).sum(by=['host']).publish(label='A')

chart.description: 5 largest average sizes of responses from upstream groups by Service/API compared with -24h overall average
chart.name: Response Size
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.kong.responses.size', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong')).sum(by=['service_name']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
K = data('counter.kong.responses.size', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong')).sum(by=['api_name']).publish(label='K', enable=False)
C = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong')).sum(by=['service_name']).publish(label='C', enable=False)
L = data('counter.kong.responses.count', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong')).sum(by=['api_name']).publish(label='L', enable=False)
M = (A/C).top(count=5).publish(label='M')
O = (K/L).top(count=5).publish(label='O')
P = (A).sum().publish(label='P', enable=False)
Q = (C).sum().publish(label='Q', enable=False)
R = (K).sum().publish(label='R', enable=False)
S = (L).sum().publish(label='S', enable=False)
V = ((P+R)/(Q+S)).timeshift('1d').publish(label='V')

chart.description: Service/API response transfer rate compared with -24h
chart.name: Bytes Out / Second
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.kong.responses.size', filter=filter('plugin', 'kong')).sum().publish(label='A')
B = (A).timeshift('1d').publish(label='B')
